price: He then said, “I gave preference to the love of fine things over the remembrance of my Lord,” until the sun went out of sight.
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَحۡبَبۡتُ حُبَّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتۡ بِٱلۡحِجَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
